alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 27 at 4:54AM CST until December 27 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and light mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Pine and Central St. Louis Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bois Forte Band, Lake Vermilion area and the Mille Lacs Band, Lena Lake and, Hinckley areas. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing and falling snow could significantly reduce visibility with white-out conditions possible at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
